EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Your Interest in Becoming a SunPower Dealer
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
Congratulations!
You've just taken your first step toward becoming part of the industry’s leading network of dealers. The next step is to complete our partner application. To begin filling out your application, please go to: http://sunpower.force.com/partners/partnerapp_1?Lid={!Lead.Id}
Once we receive your application we will review your qualifications and provide a response within fifteen business days. Please feel free to contact the customer care team should you have any questions about the application.
We thank you for your time and interest.
SunPower Customer Care Team dealerapplicants@sunpowercorp.com www.sunpowercorp.com 1-800-SUNPOWER (1-800-786-7693)
